activities.title: Internships
activities.description: Students who passed their interviews got 3-month internships to gain experience in building scalable products that are widely used around the world.

activities.title: 360° Training
activities.description: A2SV upskills students with a 360° software engineering program that focuses on problem-solving, effective speaking, and personal development.

activities.title: Social Projects
activities.description: Students work on social projects with industry experts to address the most pressing problems in their community.
activities.altText: Picture of students participating in social activities
